body_html:
I'm not sure what is causing the test failures, and do not have a PPC to reproduce this issue on.
However, we are deprecating the parallel CPU backend, and have added intra-op parallelism to the regular CPU backend. So please use the default CPU backend for XLA.

body:
I'm not sure what is causing the test failures, and do not have a PPC to reproduce this issue on.
However, we are deprecating the parallel CPU backend, and have added intra-op parallelism to the regular CPU backend. So please use the default CPU backend for XLA.
